channel.title: Dirk Jan Buter's Magazine
channel.description: Technology for Personal Growth and Innovation
channel.copyright: Dirk Jan Buter is the owner of this magazine. If you want to use text, images or anything else from it, please ask me first. Thank you!

item.title: Healthy resolutions: A new year, a new you
item.description:
Personally, 2023 was a year full of changes. It was an educational year and I learned a number of things that I want to use for my new year resolutions.
